xml.name: Completion
xml.Try: By default, completes your code instantly. Start typing .stf right where the caret is, and select the sizeToFit() function using EditorEnter.
To activate Basic Completion, press CodeCompletion and you will see lookup menu again.
Press EditorEscape to close the popup.

Smart Type Completion filters the list of suggestion to include only those types that are applicable in the current context. Press SmartTypeCompletion to see the list of matching suggestions. Choose the first one by pressing EditorEnter.
Now press CodeCompletion again to show completion options
Select plain item and press EditorChooseLookupItemReplace instead of EditorChooseLookupItem. This overwrites the word at the caret rather than simply inserting it
Now invoke CodeCompletion and EditorChooseLookupItemReplace to easily overwrite the animate(withDuration:animations:completion:) function with animate(withDuration:animations:)
